basic.description:
This course is designed to promote interest in and understanding of modern prose fiction by introducing students to a selection of the best novels and short stories of the 20th century. British, American, and Canadian authors are represented.
NOTE   Enrollment is limited to students not registered in an ENGL Plan, and preference is given to upper-year students. This course may not be used as a foundation for an ENGL Plan or a prerequisite for upper-year ENGL courses.
LEARNING HOURS    240 (72L;168P)
basic.subject: ENGL
basic.title: Modern Prose Fiction

extra.enrollment_requirement: Exclusion:  No more than 1 course from  ENGL100;110;112;160
